course_title: Pediatric Primary Care Nurse Practitioner I
class_notes: Must register for NRSG 619 Pediatric Primary Care NP Practicum I. The course is Online with some on- campus intensives. TBD.
course_description: Students will build on the foundation of pediatric well care, incorporating care of the acutely ill child in primary care settings with an emphasis on integrating advanced pediatric health assessment, health promotion and health maintenance with assessment and management of acute health problems.
prerequisites: NRSG 547 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 5613, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: S. Close, Status: Open
